data.name: Boneless Pizza Order
data.description:
Create a function that takes an object as an input. This object is an order for a boneless pizza, with each key representing a different topping the customer wants.

Example of a recipe:
```javascript
  var order = {
    topping1: "pepperoni",
    topping2: "anchovies",
    topping3: "mushrooms",
    topping4: "pineapples",
    topping5: ""
  }
```
There will be a max of 5 toppings, and at least one topping. Any unused toppings/keys will contain an empty string. The function should output a sentence stating the order.
```javascript
  bonelessPizzaOrder(order);
  // output ==> "A boneless pizza with 1. pepperoni 2. anchovies 3. mushrooms 4. pineapple"
```
The function should NOT include the unused toppings. If there are no topings at all, output "A boneless pizza with no toppings".

HINT: Check this site out for help with objects: https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Learn/JavaScript/Objects/Basics
